ssot__MemberBenefit__dlm.name: Member Benefit
ssot__MemberBenefit__dlm.description: The Member Benefit DMO represents a benefit that's available within a loyalty program that a member qualifies for and has elected to receive.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name of object where record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EndDate__c.description: The last date when member can receive loyalty program benefits.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LoyaltyBenefitId__c.description: A reference ID to perk or betterment available to loyalty program members.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramMemberId__c.description: A reference ID to person who has joined a loyalty program.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Member Benefit DMO.

ssot__MemberBenefitStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to status of member benefit for example new or pending.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the member benefit.

ssot__StartDate__c.description: The first date when member can receive loyalty program benefits.
